column2: Writing user input directly to a web page allows for a cross-site scripting vulnerability.
column4: Cross-site scripting vulnerability due to a [["user-provided value"|"relative:///main.py:14:26:14:32"]].

column2: Making a network request to a URL that is fully user-controlled allows for request forgery attacks.
column4: The full URL of this request depends on a [["user-provided value"|"relative:///main.py:14:26:14:32"]].
